description:
Humanity is walking a questionable path. With the former crew of the Yamato having experienced phantasmal visions, Kodai takes it upon himself to investigate the phenomenon further.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinpaku: Getsumen Taishikan ni Senkou Seyo
Tension: Reach the Embassy on the Moon
緊迫・月面大使館に潜行せよ
